meanings.sent1: The unmolten ice remained solid even in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: The unmolten metal was too hard to shape.
meanings.sent3: The unmolten chocolate bar was a challenge to bite into.
meanings.sent5: The unmolten rock stood firm against the elements.

meanings.definition: Not made molten or liquid by heat.
meanings.sent1: The unmolten glass sculpture retained its shape perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The unmolten wax figurine was delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The unmolten butter refused to spread on the toast.
meanings.sent4: His unmolten resolve withstood all challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unmolten lava rock was a testament to nature's power.
